summary: SummaryThe iconic Dior Addict Lip Maximizer plumping lip gloss gets a refresh with a new 90% natural-origin formula, a reimagined case and updated shades.
details: DetailsBenefitsComposed of 90% natural-origin ingredients and infused with cherry oil and hyaluronic acid, this Dior plumping lip gloss smooths and makes lips look bigger, leaving them hydrated for up to 24h. Now available in a new range of shiny shades with clear, intense, shimmering and holographic finishes.Research ResultsIn a clinical test on 28 subjects:36%+ immediate volume effect48%+ smoother lips In an instrumental test on 30 subjects:24h hydration 90% natural-origin ingredientsKey IngredientsCherry oil: contributes to lip hydration.Hyaluronic acid: works to smooth and visibly plump lips.Item 2604279How To UseApply directly on the lips as a lip gloss with mirror-like shine.Use as a lip primer, by removing excess product before applying lipstick for smooth and hydrated lips.Ingredients038 Rose Nude: Methyl Hydrogenated Rosinate, Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Polyglyceryl-10 Decaisostearate, Jojoba Esters, Polyglyceryl-3 Beeswax, Glyceryl Behenate/Eicosadioate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Dipalmitoyl Hydroxyproline, Menthoxypropanediol, Trimethylolpropane Triisostearate, Parfum (Fragrance), Prunus Avium (Sweet Cherry) Seed Oil, Ethyl Vanillin, Tocopherol, Trihydroxystearin, Capsicum Frutescens Fruit Extract, Aluminum Hydroxide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Propyl Gallate, Glucomannan. May Contain: CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 15850 (Red 7).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply directly on the lips as a lip gloss with mirror-like shine.Use as a lip primer, by removing excess product before applying lipstick for smooth and hydrated lips.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: This did nothing for my lips. It is glossy but didn't do what I had hoped for.

reviews.headline: Smooth & Hydrating
reviews.comments: Not sticky at all which is important to me. Super smooth and very hydrating. Very nice glossy finish too! Over priced though.

reviews.headline: I would buy again this product
reviews.comments: Perfect love it

reviews.headline: I would not waste my money on this product again.
reviews.comments: This is a very mid lip proud. Nothing special at all. No scent, no plumping, no pigment. I could easily think of three other products that were more effective that also cost less. The packaging is just ok. As a high end product I was extremely disappointed.

reviews.headline: Worth the price
reviews.comments: I love the color deposit of this gloss and the slight tingling effect that comes with the plumping. It doesn't dry my lips out like so many other plumping glosses do. This is my 3rd container and a 3rd new color. Every one has been worth the price.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: This gloss is great as far as shine and a glassy look, however zero plumping effect whatsoever which is why I purchased it- and I've pretty much used all lip plumpers so I was trying this one for the first time, wish it had that plumping effect and it'd be perfect

reviews.headline: NOT recommended only for those wanting a duck face look
reviews.comments:
If you want that fat upper lip this products works wonders. After application it just takes a few hours for your upper lip to balloon. Sadly, the lower lip does not react. I was looking for a bold upper and lower lip. This product didnt work for me. 

When i stopped using the product the majority of the upper lip swelling stayed FOR WEEKS! 

Disclaimer: Sarcasm above. I had a bad reaction to this product that others have experienced. DO NOT RECOMMEND this dior lip gloss.

reviews.headline: pretty  & moisturizing
reviews.comments: It looks super pink in the bottle, but when I put it on, it enhanced my lip color and felt very soft. I know it's pricey, but it's good.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Love the color. It's outstanding. Would definitely recommend to anyone

reviews.headline: BEST LIP GLOSS EVER!!!
reviews.comments: I've been buying this lipgloss for 3 years now and absolutely love it. It's the only lipgloss I wear!!!

reviews.headline: üî•üî•üî•
reviews.comments: I would buy this over & over again. It's long lasting vibrant colors non sticky one of my favs

reviews.headline: Wanted to love but can't get passed the taste
reviews.comments: This is a beautiful gloss. I love the shade but i cannot get passed the taste of this gloss. It's such a beautiful formula but the taste is absolutely disgusting and never fades. The applicator is also oddly tiny. For the price, these two significant issues shouldnt exist.

reviews.headline: Nice
reviews.comments: Dior Addict Lip Glow in shade berry is a gorgeous color reviving PH activated hydrating lip balm that has some real lasting power! It is nicely pigmented and stays that way on the lips for a long time. The packaging is sleek and modern and this makes for a great gift for yourself or someone else!

reviews.headline: I love this product my new favorite!
reviews.comments: I received this product for free. The Dior Addict Lip Glow in Pink Lilac is like a little spa day for your lips! The soft pink-lilac hue is sheer perfection‚Äîjust enough color to brighten your look without overpowering. It feels buttery smooth and leaves your lips hydrated with a subtle, healthy glow. A luxurious treat for everyday glam!

reviews.headline: A must have‚Ä¶!!!
reviews.comments: This lip glow is amazing..!!!!! Love the texture the scent love everythingüòçüòç The effectiveness of the gloss really is on another level.. Girl you need to try it

reviews.headline: THE BEES KNEES
reviews.comments: I love this lip plumper. The price is not very wallet friendly, but if you're a lip person, then it is SO worth the occasional splurge. I always have the berry one in my purse.

reviews.headline: My favorite lip gloss
reviews.comments: My favorite lip glow. What I like about it is the subtle colour. It is so pretty and light. The packaging is gorgeous. It is my go to lip product these days. I use it more like a lipstick really once I get a chance to unmask and sit down at a restaurant. Mine seems to be lasting awhile considering I use it all the time.its so shiny and gives you perfect texture.

reviews.headline: Perfect formula
reviews.comments: While these glosses are a bit pricier than others, I am an ultimate loyalist due to its exceptionally comfortable formula with a divine finish, excellent color pay-off, flawless applicator and leak-proof packaging.

reviews.headline: Doesn't last as it claims
reviews.comments: For the price i expected it to last longer than just a few hours.

reviews.headline: Absolutely Perfect!
reviews.comments: I use both Fenty Heat (10/10 stars) and this gloss. This gloss plumps and shines my lips in a sheer but extremely plumping manner. 10/10

media.headline: I love this product my new favorite!
I love this product my new favorite!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I received Dior Addict Lip Maximizer 001- delicate pink from Influenster and Dior for free for my honest opinion.
The Dior lip maximizer comes in a spectacular feminine recyclable lip gloss tube. Complete with the brand's signature mirrored lid and a CD monogram engraved on the top. The foam doe-foot applicator is a dream to work with. It's wide enough to cover my lips and allows the product to glide evenly across my lip area. When pulling the applicator out the foam tip has just the right amount of product to put on your lips.
After applying the product it feels quite cooling on the lips and has a slightly minty fragrance. I surda felt some tingling on my lips but not much. The lip maximizer didn't make my lips plump up at all. But I love it for its unparalleled shine, non-sticky finish and intense nourishment that seems to last far longer than any other gloss I've come across. I think that's because it's infused with cherry oil and hyaluronic acid. The color was such a light pink you could hardly tell you had anything on. But I added a colored lip balm and then added this on top of it for shine and to lock in that hydration to keep my lips healthy and beautiful.
I would definitely buy this just because there's so many colors to pick from and how well it hydrated and nourished my lips making them feel amazing. I would not buy it for the plumping effect since I didn't see any difference after applying it.
faceoff_positive.headline: Intense Nourishment...

faceoff_negative.comments: I received this product for free in exchange for a review. I'm always skeptical when it comes to "lip plumping" products. I have relatively full lips already; however, my mom has virtually no lips, so we both decided to try this product. Beyond the typical cooling/tingling sensation, neither of us noticed much in the way of "plumping". This gloss is also a lot tackier/stickier than other glosses I've tried, meaning it takes 2 or 3 applications minimum just to coat my lips. Forget rubbing your lips together to spread the product because it's nearly impossible. I received the color "Pink" which applied more as a clear shimmer. It doesn't last long, but I didn't really expect it to given it's a gloss. I didn't notice much change in the hydration of my lips. I live in an especially cold area & still have to apply a lip mask at night when my lips burn the most. I'll continue to use the product & update my review if needed, but upon first tries, this product is just OK.
faceoff_negative.headline: Just OK
